name: @aws-amplify/rtn-web-browser
description: React Native module for aws-amplify web browser

scripts.build-with-test: npm run clean && npm test && tsc
scripts.build:cjs:watch: rimraf dist/cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.watch.json -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --watch
scripts.build:esm:watch: rimraf dist/esm && tsc -p tsconfig.watch.json -m esnext --outDir dist/esm --watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm-cjs

author: Amazon Web Services
